st:Description.name: CATStatisticsErrorlog
st:Description.st:detailedRole: The Errorlog statistics controler manages the values of all or only a part of the attributes available for the thematic

st:attribute.Name: Version
st:attribute.st:role: Internal use - statistics settings version level.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_Activation
st:attribute.st:role: Activation state of the Errorlog statistics

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_Cumulate
st:attribute.st:role: Cumulation mode state of the Errorlog statistics
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Value of Errorlog statistics cumulation mode if false there is one file per session if true all sessions are outputted in one file

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_THEM
st:attribute.st:role: If activated, the thematic name field is outputed.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_TIME
st:attribute.st:role: If activated, the time field is outputed.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_CPUS
st:attribute.st:role: If activated, the cpu duration field is outputed.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_ELPS
st:attribute.st:role: If activated, the elapsed duration field is outputed.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_RTIM
st:attribute.st:role: If activated, the response time field is outputed.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_USER
st:attribute.st:role: If activated, the user name field is outputed.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_HOST
st:attribute.st:role: If activated, the host name field is outputed.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_UPID
st:attribute.st:role: If activated, the process id field is outputed.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_CMND
st:attribute.st:role: If activated, the current command name is outputed.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_WKBN
st:attribute.st:role: If activated, the current workbench name is outputed.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_MSGE
st:attribute.st:role: If activated, the message field is outputed.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_ABND
st:attribute.st:role: Severity level ; if activated, the events with a severity level "abend" are outputed.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_CERR
st:attribute.st:role: Severity level ; if activated, the events with a severity level "critical error" are outputed.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_WARN
st:attribute.st:role: Severity level ; if activated, the events with a severity level "warning" are outputed.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_COMT
st:attribute.st:role: Severity level ; if activated, the events with a severity level "comment" are outputed.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_UREP
st:attribute.st:role: Severity level ; if activated, the events generated by the end user through the errorlog panel are outputed, if the severity level (critical error, warning or comment)is activated.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_TimeUnit
st:attribute.st:role: Time unit for the cpu, elaped and response time.

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_DateFormat
st:attribute.st:role: Format for the date and time field.

st:enum.st:role: Unix-like UTC timestamp (since 00:00 hours, Jan 1, 1970 UTC)

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_OutputFormat
st:attribute.st:role: Output format of the Errorlog statistics

st:enum.st:role: the thematic name is not repeated on each line

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_Formating
st:attribute.st:role: Format of the Errorlog statistics

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_OutputType
st:attribute.st:role: Choice of the output media : file or console

st:enum.st:role: Console : log is outputed in the console (not used)
File : log is outputed in a file

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_OutputFile
st:attribute.st:role: Name of the output file

st:attribute.Name: ERRORLOG_OutputDirectory
st:attribute.st:role: Output directory for the statistic

st:string.st:default: Will be valued first to ${CATErrorLog}, else if ${CATTemp}. cf : CATStatsManager::GetDefaultDir() <--> default_directory
